Headline: Temporary Eastbound #72 North Ave Reroute near North Avenue Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North Ave buses are temporarily rerouted near North Avenue Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
At the request of Police, due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, Eastbound #72 North Ave buses will only provide service up to North Avenue and Clark

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Ashland
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Ashland due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Ashland due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
